turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello! Sure, I am happy to take your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What's your name and what is your preferred location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's Jane Kay and I would like to pick-up my coffee at 7608 NE Zac Lentz Pkwy Victoria, TX 77904.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome! And what size would you like it to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it to be as is?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I would like to try the coconut milk in it instead of the regular one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would also like to add some cinnamon powder and brown sugar on top, if that's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else that I can get you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! It's gonna be $4.45 plus tax and the receipt will be sent to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome! I will be there in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We will have your coffee ready by then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! Bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a beautiful day!
